String.Tutorial_Ingame_Mission4_Script250: If you hold <Key AxisOrActionName="MoveForward" AxisValue="1.0"/>, <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>Instant Boost</> will fire <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>automatically</>.

String.Option_rookie6_Static96_1:
[<image id="beginnercare"/>Automatic]
Provides a streamlined experience for new racers.
- Enables all Driving Assistance features.
- Displays <image id="beginnercare"/> to the right of your racer name.

[Original]
Puts you in complete manual control of your kart. Ideal for experienced racers.
- Pick and choose the Driving Assistance features that you want.
- Edge Guardrails and Corner Guardrails cannot be used in Original.
String.Option_control5_Static31:
[<image id="r2"/> Accelerate]
- This is the default control scheme for KartRider: Drift.
- Accelerate with <image id="r2"/> and reverse with <image id="l2"/>.

[<image id="o"/> Accelerate]
- This is a control scheme seen in other racing games.
- Accelerate with <image id="o"/> and reverse with <image id="x"/>.

Customize your controls as you see fit.
Controls will revert to default upon reset.
String.Option_control5_Static28:
[<image id="rt"/> Accelerate]
- This is the default control scheme for KartRider: Drift.
- Accelerate with <image id="rt"/> and reverse with <image id="lt"/>.

[<image id="b"/> Accelerate]
- This is a control scheme seen in other racing games.
- Accelerate with <image id="b"/> and reverse with <image id="a"/>.

Customize your controls as you see fit.
Controls will revert to default upon reset.
String.Option_control5_Static25:
[Arrow Key Movement]
- This is the default control scheme for KartRider: Drift.
- Accelerate, reverse, and steer using the arrow keys.

[WASD Movement]
- This is a control scheme seen in other racing games.
- Accelerate, reverse, and steer using the W, A, S, and D keys.

Customize your controls as you see fit.
Controls will revert to default upon reset.
String.Option_rookie6_Static85:
[On]
- Gradually corrects your drift angle.
- Recommended for racers not familiar with drifting.

[Off]
- Take precise control over your drift.
- Recommended for racers who drift with precision.

String.Option_rookie6_Static96:
[Auto]
- Enables all control assistance settings to ensure comfortable gameplay.
- Displays <image id="beginnercare"/> to the right of your racer name.

[Manual]
- Manually enable or disable control assistance settings as you want.
- However, Edge Guardrails and Corner Guardrails cannot be in Manual.

String.Achievement_Desc_616: Finish a perfect race with no track collisions. (Applies only to matched races.)
String.Item_Consumption:701000002_DESC: A fancy box made of solid titanium.
String.Item_Costume:216000004_DESC:
Who's a dashing little prince? Who's a dashing little prince?
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Bwaaah bwah bububub?"</>
String.Item_Kart:401000027_DESC: This kart will make you appreciate the power of a fresh, crispy carrot.
String.Item_Kart:401000017_DESC: This kart can handle any challenge as long as you've got carrots.
String.Item_Costume:210000004_DESC:
Marid won the class presidency by a landslide.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Our school is the best because your president is the best!"</>
String.License_L2_Desc: Earn the L2 License and prove that you're more than intermediate.
String.TrackDesc_Forest_I07: A panda village sits in the center of a quaint bamboo forest. Diz and her friends make regular visits here, hobnobbing with the most charming pandas this side of Bubble Hill.
String.Community_toast_Static21: That racer already joined your party.
String.Community_toast_Static65: That racer is unavailable to be invited to a custom race.
String.Community_toast_Static39: That racer is not available to party.
String.Item_Kart:401000045_DESC: A rising star from the macrocosm! This is the start of a new racing revolution.
String.Item_Costume:202000005_DESC:
It's his first year in college, and Bazzi's future is bright.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I'm thinking of majoring in Napping with a minor in Snackery."</>
String.Tutorial_Lobby_Script20: If you want to learn more advanced racing techniques, try out some <Scenario_Desc_Emphasize>License</> challenges.
String.Item_Costume:217000005_DESC:
As sheriff, Airi has taken it upon herself to guide the townsfolk down the right path.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Crime is bad!"</>
String.Item_Kart:401000140_DESC: Faster! Sharper! More agile! Achieve victory by any means.
String.Item_Costume:203000012_DESC:
Brodi's been worn down by the hard life of the outlaw. When will the violence end?
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Shoot on three. One... Two... Two-and-a-half..."</>
String.Item_Costume:213000005_DESC:
Neo is the hero of the future.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Initiating justice protocol!"</>
String.ShopItem-HalloweenDevilPack_DetailDesc: Character: Devil Marid, Kart: Devil, Accessory: Devil License Plate
String.Item_Kart:401000059_DESC: Cast a shadow of doom over the leading kart...
String.Item_Kart:401000068_DESC: It searches the track with greedy goblin eyes. Where's the gold?
String.Item_Kart:401000064_DESC: This tree became furious after being struck down by an axe. It now races all over the world in search of the culprit.
String.Item_Motion:322010006_DESC: Can't pass up a donut! Chomp!
String.Item_Motion:322020006_DESC: Can't pass up a donut! Chomp!
String.Item_Character:100000030_DESC:
This queen of the beach looks cold, but she's actually got a warm and tender heart. And boy does she love to dance!
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Shall we dance?"</>
String.Item_Kart:401000161_DESC:
Paint the track with happiness!
<Dialog_ItemBoldYellow>- Exclusive to Android devices. Appears differently on other platforms.</>
String.TrackDesc_Ice_R01: Enjoy the thrill of winter sports... on a kart! And there's no need to worry about climbing back up the hill, because there's a trolley waiting for you at the bottom.
String.TrackDesc_Mine_R04: A frightening cave, a precipitous ravine, and a lake of lava. This track is dangerous! Don't you dare cut any corners! On the other hand, those shortcuts look mighty tempting...
String.Item_Kart:401000132_DESC: Dart and weave! Race around the track at the speed of sound.

Tiera is a witch from the fairytale land of Prettion. She seems shy at first, but get her talking about magic and she'll never stop!

String.Option_rookie6_Static27:
Corrects the maximum drift angle to prevent oversteering when Drift is held for a long time. Oversteering correction is strong at max stage, with decreasing effects at medium and min stages.

While enabled, a Driving Assistance Balloon will be attached to your kart.

Max: Available for B2 racers or lower.

Medium: Available for B1 racers or lower.

Min: Available for L3 racers or lower.

Diz sets sail on her first voyage aboard her ship, The Diz.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"To the horizon... and beyond!"</>

String.Item_Costume:210000002_DESC:
Marid exudes a posh cuteness.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"I know, I'm fabulous."</>
String.TrackDesc_World_I02: This nighttime tour of London centers on the large observation deck that brightens London's night sky. There are hidden attractions here and there, such as Brodi as a royal guard... It almost makes you want to drive slowly and take in the sights.

Tiera, the cheerleading captain? Who talked her into this?!

String.Item_Character:100000011_DESC:
This infamous pirate of the seven seas gets his kicks by running other karts off the road. His garage is filled with karts and doubloons.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"Avast! The first-place treasure be mine!"</>
String.Item_Costume:211000001_DESC:
This infamous pirate of the seven seas gets his kicks by running other karts off the road. His garage is filled with karts and doubloons.

<Dialog_ItemBold>"My kick is faster than a kart!"</>
String.TrackDesc_Village_I04: This is an essential Boom Hill track. The long, straight sections make it perfect for beginners, with five spots that are ideal for drifting.
String.TrackDesc_Village_I10: Bask in the laid-back atmosphere of Boom Hill! You can watch the hot air balloons drift and the windmills turn as you leave the competition in the dust.
String.TrackDesc_Village_I02: A track shaped like a finger in Boom Hill. It's a favorite spot for racers practicing their drifting. Bazzi was so taken with the interesting track shape that he accidentally spent all day practicing.
String.TrackDesc_Ice_R04: A track modeled after the stadium in Boom Hill. You can hear the audience scream and cheer as you zip around the curves and corners.
String.TrackDesc_Village_R01: An infamous track in Boom Hill. This is the famous site of Dao and Bazzi's racing duel. Winning here depends on your skill as a drifter and your knowledge of the course.
String.TrackDesc_Village_I09: The groves of Boom Hill produce some of the finest lemons in the land! The road is in sorry shape due to some major plumbing catastrophes... in spite of Bazzi's best efforts to fix them up.
String.Item_Character:100000017_DESC:
This lively girl from Brazil is an excellent engineer. She's on a mission to redeem her friend, Kris.
<Dialog_ItemBold>"We must stop Kris!"</>
String.Item_Costume:217000001_DESC:

String.Item_Character:100000036_DESC:

String.Option_rookie6_Static2:
Enable various features to help guide your driving. A Driving Assistance Balloon will be attached to your kart depending on what stage you have this set to.

Max: Available for B2 racers. Gives strong driving assistance. This is ideal for learning drivers!

Medium: Available for B1 racers or lower. Gives mild driving assistance.

Min: Available for L3 racers or lower. Gives notifications, but no direct driving assistance.

Custom: Enable each feature individually.
